item.title: [Python] Observing Gemini meteor shower with RaspberryPi4
item.description: # Overview I have purchased Raspberry Pi 4, so I will talk about making a shooting star radio observation system with Raspberry Pi. Also, since 12/12~15 is the Gemini meteor shower every year, I tried to see if I could actually observe it. It will be a long story because it will be explained from the principle. #Observation principle A shooting star appears when dust floating in the universe plunges into the Earth’s atmosphere, collides violently, and emits plasma.
